Albania: The Albanians, led by Skanderbeg, routed Ottoman forces.
Belgium: Tournament held on the main square in Leuven in the presence of Philip the Good, Duke of Burgundy and Brabant.
Burma:
Binnya Kyan increases the height of the Shwedagon Pagoda to 302 feet
Rise of early Burmese vernacular literature
Russia: The boyars of Moscow expelled Shemyaka from the Kremlin and recalled Vasili II to the throne.
